description: This file defines API endpoints for managing MIB (Management Information Base) modules, including uploading, listing, retrieving details, listing OIDs, and deleting modules. It is part of a backend service built with FastAPI and interacts with database sessions and background tasks.

methods.name: upload_mib( request: Request, file: UploadFile = File(..., description="MIB file to upload"), name: Optional[str] = Form(None, description="Optional module name override"), )
methods.description: Endpoint to upload a MIB file for background parsing, initiating a background task, and returning the task ID.

methods.name: list_mib_modules( request: Request, search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search by module name"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number"), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Items per page"), )
methods.description: Endpoint to list MIB modules with search and pagination options.

methods.name: get_mib_module( module_id: str, request: Request, )
methods.description: Retrieve details for a specific MIB module by ID.

methods.name: list_module_oids( module_id: str, request: Request, oid_prefix: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by OID prefix (e.g., '1.3.6.1')"), name_search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search by OID name"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number"), page_size: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200, description="Items per page"), )
methods.description: List OIDs associated with a specific MIB module, supporting filtering and pagination.

methods.name: delete_mib_module( module_id: str, request: Request, )
methods.description: Delete a MIB module and its associated OIDs, with access restricted to tenant-owned modules.

ctags.name: list_mib_modules
ctags.signature: ( request: Request, search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search by module name"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number"), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100, description="Items per page"), )

ctags.name: list_module_oids
ctags.signature: ( module_id: str, request: Request, oid_prefix: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Filter by OID prefix (e.g., '1.3.6.1')"), name_search: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search by OID name"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number"), page_size: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200, description="Items per page"), )

ctags.name: upload_mib
ctags.signature: ( request: Request, file: UploadFile = File(..., description="MIB file to upload"), name: Optional[str] = Form(None, description="Optional module name override"), )
